name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.  This ability does not stack with a held item.  Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
abilities.description: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
